name: Eggplant Parmesean
description: Baked eggplant with bread crumbs and cheese
directions: dip eggplant slices into egg, then in bread crumbs. Place in a single layer on a baking sheet. Bake in preheated over for 5 mins on each side.

in a 9x13 inch baking dish spread spaghetti sauce to cover the bottom. Place a layer of eggplant slices in the sauce. Sprinkle with mozzarella and parmesean cheese. Repeat with remaining ingredients, ending with the cheesees. Sprinkle basil on top.
Bake in preheated oven for 35 mins, or until golden brown

name: Lasagna
description: Layers of goodness in this cheesy delight
directions: In a dutch oven, cook sausage, ground beef, onion and garlic over medium heat until well browned. Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomatoe paste, tomatoe sauce, and water. Season with sugar, basil, fennel seeds, iltalian seasoning, 1 teaspoon salt, pepper, and 2 tablespoon parsley. Simmer, covered, for about 1 1/2 hours, stirring occasionally

Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook lasagna noodles in boiling water for 8 to 10 minutes. Drain noodles, rinse with cold water. In a mixing bowl, combine ricotta cheese with egg, remaining parsley, and 1/2 teaspoon salt.

To assemble, spread 1 1/2 cups of meat sauce in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish. Arrange 6 noodles lenghtwise over meat sauce. Spread with one half of the ricotta cheese mixture. Top with a third of mozzarella cheese slices. Spoon 1/2 cup meat sauce over mozzarella, and sprinkle with 1/4 cup Parmesen cheese. Repeat layers, and top with remaing mozzarella and parmesean cheese. Cover with foil: to prevent sticking, either spray foil with cooking spray or make sure foil does not touch the cheese.
Bake in preheated oven for 25 minutes. Remove foil, and bake an additional 25 minutes. Cool for 15 minutes before serbing

name: Monterey Chicken
directions: to marinate: Place chicken in a nonporous glass dish or bowl. Pour marinade over chicken and toss to coat. Cover and refridgerate to marinate for 1 to 2 hours

Place chicken in a 9x13 inch baking dish and bake preheated oven for 20 to 30 mins, or intil cooked through and juices run clear. Meanwhile, place bacon in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown. Drain and set aside.

In same skillet, melt butter over medium high heat. Saute onion, bell pepper and mushrooms for about 3 to 5 mins. Add remaining 1/3 cup of marinade and simmer until soft. Drain and set onion mixture aside.
Top baked chicken with bacon strips. Add onion mixture and top each breast with a slice of cheese. Bake for another 10 -15 mins or until cheese is melted and bubbly.

name: Pad Thai
ingredients: 8 oz boneless, skinless chicken breast, cubed
directions: Fill a large bowl with hot tap water and place the noodles in it to soak for 20 mins
In a small bowl, stir together the fish sauce, lime juice, sugar, oyster sauce, 2 teaspoons of the chile sauce and chicken stock. Set aside.

Heat a wok or a large skillet over high heat and add vegetable oil. When the oil is hot , stir in garlic and cook for about 10 seconds. Add shrimp and chicken; cook, stirring constantly until shrimp is opaque and chicken is cooked through, 5 - 7 mins

Move everything in the wok out to the sides and pour the eggs in the center. Cook and stir egges until firm. Add the noodles to the wok and pour in the sauce. Cook, stirring constantly until the noodles are tender. Add a bit more water if needed to finish cooking the noodles.
